Yoga Mat with Built-in Blocks and Bolsters: Integrate foam blocks and bolsters into the mat, offering users a convenient way to perform a variety of yoga poses without needing to retrieve separate props from a bag or box.
Yoga Mat with Built-in Sandals: Design a yoga mat with built-in sandals, providing a comfortable and hygienic surface for barefoot practice while also offering grip and support for the feet.
Yoga Mat with Built-in Timer: Incorporate a built-in timer into the mat, allowing users to track their practice time and ensure they are holding each pose for the recommended duration.
Yoga Mat with Integrated Weight System: Develop a yoga mat with a built-in weight system, enabling users to add resistance to their practice and increase the intensity of their workouts.
Yoga Mat with Built-in Meditation App: Develop a yoga mat with a built-in meditation app, allowing users to access guided meditations and breathing exercises directly from the mat.
